Detroit Metro Airport is about a 15 minute drive from Garden City
Garden City is home to the world's first K-mart. 29600 Ford Rd

value: address=31015 Ford Rd, Garden City, MI 48135
content=Independent music/CD store, specializing in underground, punk, metal, imports, local acts. Also sell shirts, toys, decorations.
content=Great authentic Middle Eastern cuisine. A great combo meal for two includes rice, hummus, fattoush, chicken shawarma, beef kabobs, chicken kabobs, falafels, grape leaves, and much more.
address=5652 Middlebelt Rd Garden City, MI 48135

content=Great Cantonese cuisine.  The highlight of the menu is the Almond Chicken, delicious and rare, if not impossible to find in any other state.  It is perfectly paired with the pork fried rice.  The brick building used to be marked with a lovely old neon sign, but was replaced recently with something much cheaper.  Don't let the sign dissuade you from the amazing food inside.
